text: Scott Jurek (b. October 26, 1973) is an famous runner who lives in Seattle, California. He is perhaps best known for running the difficult Western States 100 Mile Race seven years in a row. He has also won the Badwater Ultramarathon the past two years. Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota Category:American long-distance runners
title: Scott Jurek
